equation:
\begin{equation}\label{TN}
ds^2 = -dx_0^2 + \cdots + dx_6^2 + H\left(dr^2 + r^2 d\Omega^2 \right) +
H^{-1}\left(dy + c\cdot\cos\theta d\psi\right)^2. 
\

\begin{equation}\label{gtn}
ds^2 = G_1 (r)\left(dr^2 + r^2 d\Omega_2^2 \right) + G_2 (r)\left(dy +
\beta\cdot\cos\theta d\psi\right)^2. 
\

\begin{equation}
\begin{array}{cccc} e^r = G_1^\frac{1}{2} dr, & e^\theta = rG_1^\frac{1}{2} d\theta, &
e^\psi = r\sin\theta G_1^\frac{1}{2} d\psi, & e^y = G_2^\frac{1}{2} \left(dy +
\beta\cdot\cos\theta d\psi\right) \\\end{array}. 
\

\begin{equation}
-\int\omega\wedge\omega = 2\beta\int g'(r)g(r)\sin\theta dr\, d\theta\, d\psi\, dy =
8\pi^2 \beta g_s \ell_s \left. \left[g(r)\right]^2 \right|_0^\infty. 
\
\begin{equation}\label{usual} ds^2 = f(r) ds_{\rm space-time}^2 + ds_{{\cal M}}^2. \

\begin{equation} \label{usualexp}\delta A_3 =
\phi(x) C^{(3)} + A_1(x) \, C^{(2)} + \delta B_2 \, C^{(1)}\

\begin{equation}\label{generalansatz}  \delta A_3 = A_\mu dx^\mu \, C^{(2)}_1 + A_1 dz^1 \, C^{(2)}_2 + A_2 dz^2
\, C^{(2)}_3, \

\begin{equation}   \delta A_3 = \left( A_\mu dx^\mu  + A_1 dz^1 + A_2 dz^2 \right)
\wedge \omega, \label{fluct}\

\begin{equation} \label{eomC} d\,
\hat{*}\, d\, \delta A_3 = - G_4 \wedge d \delta A_3, \

\begin{equation} \int \delta g \Delta_L  \delta g + \delta(\hat{*} G_4) \wedge \delta(\hat{*}
G_4) + \delta(\hat{*} G_4) \wedge  d\delta A_3, \

\begin{equation}
e^{z_i} = H_1^{\frac{1}{3}} H_2^{-\frac{1}{3}} \left[dZ^i - 2\pi\ell_p^2 \left(
\tan\alpha H_1^{-1} \epsilon^{ij} - \theta^{ij} \right) \left(\partial_\mu A_j dx^\mu + 
\partial_k A_j dZ^k \right)\right]. 
\

\begin{equation}
e^{z_i} = H_1^{\frac{1}{3}} H_2^{-\frac{1}{3}} \left[dZ^i - 2\pi\ell_p^2
\frac{1}{\sin\alpha\cos\alpha} H_1^{-1} H_2 \epsilon^{ij} \left(\partial_\mu A_j dx^\mu + 
\partial_k A_j dZ^k \right)\right].
\

\begin{equation}
e^{z_i} = H_1^{\frac{1}{3}} H_2^{-\frac{1}{3}} \left[dZ^i - 2\pi\ell_p^2
\frac{1}{\tan\alpha} \epsilon^{ij} \left(\partial_\mu A_j dx^\mu + \partial_k A_j dZ^k
\right)\right]. 
\

\begin{equation}
\label{diffeoimage}
\langle G_4\rangle +\delta G_4\mapsto
\tan\alpha dZ^1\wedge dZ^2 \wedge d\left[H_2^{-1} (dy + 
\frac{R}{2} \cos\theta\ d\psi)\right] + P_i dZ^i \wedge dr
\wedge d\theta\wedge d\psi,
\

\begin{equation}
A_1(z) = A_1(Z) - \frac{1}{\sin\alpha\cos\alpha} H_1^{-1} H_2 \left(A_2 \partial_1 A_1 - 
A_1 \partial_2 A_1 \right) + {\cal O}(A^3).
\
